segments.text: What a sneaky little operation those kids have going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that stool, fishing cookies out of the jar like a pro.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister's reaching up, all excited for her share— so cute!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She' s busy drying plates, totally absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is hilarious; water's everywhere, and she hasn't noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle— splash!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, like a postcard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the light comes through the window, making everything glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those stacked dishes on the counter wait patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's full; plenty for both kids to enjoy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment captures pure childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the unstable stool adds to the adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
